properties.entry:
SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, CITY_NO, MEMBER_NO, COMMUNITY_CONTENT, COUNT, COMMUNITY_DATE, TB_COMMUNITY.STATUS STATUS FROM TB_COMMUNITY
JOIN MEMBER ON (MEMBER.MEM_NO=TB_COMMUNITY.MEMBER_NO)
WHERE TB_COMMUNITY.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
